question: Saanvi and Mateo found 8 chocolate bars. They bought 5. How many were left?
They saw 12 apple juices on the shelf. They chose 7. How many were still there?
Saanvi got 8 lollipops. Mateo got 6 more lollipops. How many apples do they have in total?
Saanvi found 6 cookies. Mateo found 5 more cookies. How many cookies do they have together?
They found 15 packets of chips. They bought 10. How many were left?
Mateo had 19 marbles but he lost 6 marbles. How many marbles does Mateo have now?
Saanvi found 16 bags of popcorn. If she gave 12 to Mateo, how many does she have left?
Mateo bought 15 bottles of apple juice. Saanvi added 12 more bottles. How many bottles of apple juice do they have now?
Saanvi bought 15 muffins. Mateo bought 13 more muffins. How many muffins do they have in total?
They found 25 packets of candies on a shelf. They bought 10. How many were left on the shelf?
